name: GET_PaymentMethod
description: This operation allows you to get the detailed information about a payment method.

Zuora-Track-Id.description:
A custom identifier for tracing the API call. If you set a value for this header, Zuora returns the same value in the response headers. This header enables you to associate your system process identifiers with Zuora API calls, to assist with troubleshooting in the event of an issue.

The value of this field must use the US-ASCII character set and must not include any of the following characters: colon (`:`), semicolon (`;`), double quote (`"`), and quote (`'`).

Zuora-Entity-Ids.description: An entity ID. If you have [Zuora Multi-entity](https://knowledgecenter.zuora.com/BB_Introducing_Z_Business/Multi-entity) enabled and the OAuth token is valid for more than one entity, you must use this header to specify which entity to perform the operation in. If the OAuth token is only valid for a single entity, or you do not have Zuora Multi-entity enabled, you do not need to set this header.

payment-method-id.description: Unique ID of the payment method to update.

$block: Container for custom fields of a payment method object.

$ul: **accountHolderInfo**: The account holder information.
**accountHolderName**: The full name of the account holder.
**addressLine1**: The first line of the address for the account holder.
**addressLine2**: The second line of the address for the account holder.
**city**: The city where the account holder stays.
**country**: The country where the account holder stays.
**email**: The email address of the account holder.
**phone**: The phone number of the account holder.
**state**: The state where the account holder stays.
**zipCode**: The zip code for the address of the account holder.
**id**: The payment method ID.
**isDefault**: Indicates whether this payment method is the default payment method for the account.
**mandateInfo**: The mandate information for the Credit Card, ACH, or Bank Transfer payment method.
**existingMandateStatus**: Indicates whether the mandate is an existing mandate.
**mandateCreationDate**: The date on which the mandate was created.
**mandateId**: The mandate ID.
**mandateReason**: The reason of the mandate from the gateway side.
**mandateReceivedStatus**: Indicates whether the mandate is received from the gateway
**mandateStatus**: The status of the mandate from the gateway side.
**mandateUpdateDate**: The date on which the mandate was updated.
**mitConsentAgreementRef**: Reference for the consent agreement that you have established with the customer.
**mitConsentAgreementSrc**
**mitProfileAction**: Specifies how Zuora activates the stored credential profile. Only applicable if you set the `status` field to `Active`.
**mitProfileAgreedOn**: The date on which the stored credential profile is agreed. The date format is `yyyy-mm-dd`.
**mitProfileType**: Indicates the type of the stored credential profile.
**mitTransactionId**: Specifies the ID of the transaction. Only applicable if you set the `mitProfileAction` field to `Persist`.
**status**: The status of the payment method.
**type**: The type of the payment method. For example, `CreditCard`.
**IBAN**: The International Bank Account Number used to create the SEPA payment method. The value is masked.
**accountNumber**: The number of the customer's bank account and it is masked.
**bankCode**: The sort code or number that identifies the bank. This is also known as the sort code.
**bankTransferType**: The type of the Bank Transfer payment method. For example, `SEPA`.
**branchCode**: The branch code of the bank used for Direct Debit.
**businessIdentificationCode**: The BIC code used for SEPA. The value is masked.
**identityNumber**: The identity number used for Bank Transfer.
**bankABACode**: The nine-digit routing number or ABA number used by banks. This field is only required if the `type` field is set to `ACH`.
**bankAccountName**: The name of the account holder, which can be either a person or a company. This field is only required if the `type` field is set to `ACH`.
**bankAccountNumber**: The bank account number associated with the ACH payment. This field is only required if the `type` field is set to `ACH`.
**bankAccountType**: The type of bank account associated with the ACH payment. This field is only required if the `type` field is set to `ACH`.
**bankName**: The name of the bank where the ACH payment account is held. This field is only required if the `type` field is set to `ACH`.
**cardNumber**: The masked credit card number.
**expirationMonth**: One or two digits expiration month (1-12).
**expirationYear**: Four-digit expiration year.
**securityCode**: The CVV or CVV2 security code for the credit card or debit card.
**BAID**: ID of a PayPal billing agreement. For example, I-1TJ3GAGG82Y9.
**email**: Email address associated with the PayPal payment method.
**preapprovalKey**: The PayPal preapproval key.
